title: Moon hints at three-way summit with the North and U.S.
text:
Moon hints at three-way summit with the North and U.S. 7:01am EDT - 00:52 
South Korean President Moon Jae-in says a three-way summit with North Korea and the United States is possible and that talks should aim for an end to the nuclear threat on the Korean peninsula.   
South Korean President Moon Jae-in says a three-way summit with North Korea and the United States is possible and that talks should aim for an end to the nuclear threat on the Korean peninsula.  //reut.rs/2psK8J4
